application.name: isis2ascii
application.brief: Export cube to an ascii file
application.description:
This program converts sn ISIS cube to ASCII file format. Special pixels such as NULL, LIS, LRS, HIS and HRS have predetermined pixel values. You may opt to assign a range of pixel values to the individual Special Pixels using the SETPIXELVALUES parameter. Bands in the cube will be output in band sequential format.
Beware: The output file will be roughly 3 times as big as the input.

history.change: Fixed bug-was writing LRS for LIS values.
Added-lien:Use IsisString class when outputing pixel values.
Fixed problem with isiscvs not checking in the thumb and image directories.
Modified schema location from astogeology... to isis.astrogeology..."
Modified filename parameters to be cube parameters where necessary
Increased precision of the DNs in the output text file from 6 to 7
Added the ability for a user to specify the special pixel values
Changed output formatting to use a delimiter that is placed after each entry, rather than depending on a set width.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The file name of the input cube to be listed.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The file name of the ascii output file.

parameter.name: HEADER
parameter.description: If set to yes, a brief header will be printed to the ascii file which will include the cube name and dimensions.

parameter.name: DELIMITER
parameter.description: Sets the value to place between entries in the output file. This will default to a space if nothing is entered.

parameter.name: SETPIXELVALUES
parameter.brief: User defined output for special pixels
parameter.description: Determine whether the user would like a specific output for the special pixels in the image.

parameter.name: NULLVALUE
parameter.brief: Value to set to any null pixel
parameter.description: Value that will replace any null pixel within a cub with the number entered. Defaults to NULL if nothing is entered.

parameter.name: LRSVALUE
parameter.brief: Value to set to any LRS pixel
parameter.description: Value that will replace any LRS pixel within a cub with the number entered. Defaults to LRS if nothing is entered.

parameter.name: LISVALUE
parameter.brief: Value to set to any LIS pixel
parameter.description: Value that will replace any LIS pixel within a cub with the number entered. Defaults to LIS if nothing is entered.

parameter.name: HISVALUE
parameter.brief: Value to set to any HIS pixel
parameter.description: Value that will replace any HIS pixel within a cub with the number entered. Defaults to HIS if nothing is entered.

parameter.name: HRSVALUE
parameter.brief: Value to set to any HRS pixel
parameter.description: Value that will replace any HRS pixel within a cub with the number entered. Defaults to HRS if nothing is entered.

liens.item: Use IsisString class when outputing pixel values.
